mean_cn: n. 无线电通讯；电信学
mean_en: the technology of sending signals, images and messages over long distances by radio, telephone, television, satellite, etc.
sentence: It is the biggest company in telecommunications in China.
sentence_trans: 这是中国电信行业最大的公司。
